name: ElementRun
description:
ElementRun is a competitive shooting game where you are the weapon! There are four elements available, fire, lightning, grass and water.  The winner is the last one alive in the hardest two minute match  you have taken part of.  Play if you dare.

Instructions:

Each player walks without a key.

Player1: Turn 90° left with A, but right with D. The player shoots with S.

Player2: Turn 90° left with J, but right with L . The player shoots with K.

Some elements do more damage to others. Such as,  fire does a lot of damage to grass and grass to lightning and so on.

Credits:

The drawings are hand drawn by us.

Music:  Youtube audio library.

Sound effects:  freesound.org.
